solution_line_template: He uses {normal_buckets} buckets to fill his bath normally because {total_buckets_to_fill} - {buckets_removed} = <<{total_buckets_to_fill}-{buckets_removed}={normal_buckets}>>{normal_buckets}
He uses {daily_ounces} ounces a day for his baths because {normal_buckets} x {bucket_ounces} = <<{normal_buckets}*{bucket_ounces}={daily_ounces}>>{daily_ounces}
He uses {weekly_ounces} ounces a week for his baths because {days_per_week} x {daily_ounces} = <<{days_per_week}*{daily_ounces}={weekly_ounces}>>{weekly_ounces}
